name: n-body (itch)
description:
n-body is a relaxing golf game in space. Launch stars in different solar systems with relaxing soundscapes and slowly form constellations.

Features

  • 12 different constellations to create
  • 4 different seasons with unique soundscapes
  • ~30 minutes of gameplay

Controls

  • Mouse to aim
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click to speed up time
Current Sokpop Collection
